name: Django coffee table
tagline: Control of tables in templates sans BS.
body:
django\_coffee\_table
=====================

[![PyPI package](https://badge.fury.io/py/django_coffee_table.png)](http://badge.fury.io/py/django_coffee_table)
[![PyPI downloads](https://pypip.in/d/django_coffee_table/badge.png)](https://crate.io/packages/django_coffee_table?version=latest)
[![Travis](https://travis-ci.org/alixedi/django_coffee_table.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/alixedi/django_coffee_table)
[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/alixedi/django_coffee_table/badge.png?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/r/alixedi/django_coffee_table?branch=master)

Control html tables - paging, sorting, css, checkbox column, primary-key column, help text, custom columns, model field columns, foreign key field columns etc. in templates with a beautiful declarative syntax.

If the above is not enough, Coffee Table will automatically optimize your query using select\_related so that each page of the table will be rendered by a single SQL query.

Installation
------------

CoffeeTable is at the cheeseshop: :

    pip install django_coffee_table

Usage
-----

To use coffee\_table in your project:

1.  Set up dependencies according to their respective documentation:

    -   [linaro-django-pagination](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/linaro-django-pagination/2.0.2)
    -   [django-resort](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django_resort/0.1.0)
    -   [django-tag-parser](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-tag-parser/1.0.3)


2.  Include django\_coffee\_table in your INSTALLED\_APPS.


3.  Open your template and load up the coffee\_table tags library:

        {% load coffee_table %}


4.  Basic usage:

        {% coffee_table object_list %}


5.  Advanced usage:

        {% coffee_table 
           object_list 
           field_accessors='name, content_type__app_label'
           paginate_by='10'
           table_class='table table-condensed'
           checkbox_column=True
           primary_key_column=True
           help_text=True %}


Please see the included test project for more help.
